  <description>

      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>2b64b51f-dd2d-44f5-9201-e8140d2fa257#1#9</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Lelőhelyek és régészeti iparok</string>
            <string language="en">quarries and archeology industries</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Steinbrüche und Archäologieindustrien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">carrières et industries d'archéologie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">quarries e indústrias do archeology</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cave ed industrie di archeologia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λατομεία και βιομηχανίες αρχαιολογίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">minas e industrias de la arqueología</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az őskőkor lelőhelyei és a kőeszköz-együttesek</string>
            <string language="en">Querries of palaeloitchic age and stone tool joints</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">paleolitikum,  eszközkészítés,  terra sigillata,  </string>
            <string language="en">Paleoitic ages, tool making, terra sigillata</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Querries der palaeloitchic Alter und 
Steinhilfsmittelverbindungen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Querries des joints palaeloitchic d'outil d'âge 
et de pierre</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Querries de junções palaeloitchic da ferramenta 
da idade e da pedra</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Querries dei giunti palaeloitchic dello strumento 
della pietra e di età</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Querries των palaeloitchic ενώσεων εργαλείων 
ηλικίας και πετρών</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Querries de los empalmes palaeloitchic de la 
herramienta de la edad y de la piedra</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Paleoitic Alter, bildendes Hilfsmittel, terra sigillata</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Âges de Paleoitic, outil faisant, sigillata de terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Idades de Paleoitic, ferramenta que faz, sigillata do 
terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Età di Paleoitic, strumento che fa, sigillata di terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλικίες Paleoitic, εργαλείο που κάνουν, sigillata 
terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Edades de Paleoitic, herramienta que hace, sigillata del
terra</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
